dict.string:
Former BEPiD Student, Industrial and Systems Undergraduate Student, and technology enthusiast. My interests are Entrepreneurship, Mobile Development, Modeling and Development of Systems, and Learning foreign languages. I also like to watch TED talks, go to the gym, and hang out with my friends on the weekends
rios.p.felipe@gmail.com +55 51 99713185
Elementary school. It is among the top 20 best elementary schools in the city. Activities: singing with the class in the church, choir, art, and cultural activities (visiting museums and parks)

The third best high school in the city. Activities: learning humanities and hard sciences, preparation for the SAT, and sports practice. Participated in the Rosario Olimpic Games in the swimming and volleyball sections. We got the first place!

Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul University: the best private university in Brazil. Major in Industrial and Systems Engineering. Studied opitimization of processess, optimization of transportation routes, quality management, and entrepreneurship

Awarded Brazil Scientific Mobility Program to study abroad for one year. Lived in Auburn, AL. Studied, JAVA, Matlab, English, Stochastic Operations, and modeling and analysis of systems through simulation

One of the best experiences of my life! Lived THE Silicon Valey, in Stanford. Studied Decision Making Process with B. Robinson and Technology Entrepreneurship in Thomas Kosnik's class, with lectures from venture capitalists experts like Guy Kawasaki. GPA:4.0

Worked in the aggregated services management area developing and presenting the key performance indicators of the departaments. Analized the time-in-system of the invoice payments inside the shared services center. Translated documents and developed a system to verify the compliance of automated reports

Participated in the first edition of Brazil Educational Program for iOS Development. An innovative program to teach students iOS development. Use of CBL (Challenge Based Learning) that creates a collaborative environment to solve challenges. Use of Scrum Agile Project Management approach to coordinate the projects
Founded Omega Code, a mobile solutions company. Everything we do is thinking in the user needs and user experience. Ou passion is to work on meaninful projects that can change people's lives.

App iOS to manage personal finances. Features: pie chart, password lock, reminders, and categorization of transactions. It has been among the top 10 free apps in the finance category. Available in English, Spanish and Portuguese. More than 17.000 downloads
Corporate iOS app that confirms attendance through SMS and email of client appointments scheduled with professionals. Features appointment agenda and charts to analyze business growth

Languages: English, Spanish, and Portuguese. Experience with programming languages such as Objective C, JAVA, matlab, and Python (+Django & Django REST), SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with Adobe Photoshop & After Effects, design patterns, iBeacons, modeling relational databases, and Agile Software Development
